website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a sharp blade that gets the job done.
pros: Made from high-grade Japanese steel and comes with a 5-year warranty
cons: Some users find it difficult to get used to the grip texture

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is great, regardless of how cheap it is. I have an expensive set of knives at home and wanted one with a cover to take with me. I have a Pure Komachi chef's knife, paring knife and smaller cutting board for when we travel and use rental condos. My wife always has the paring knife with her for prepping the kids lunch when they are out. I like the handle on this Zyliss much better. The Komachi is slippery plastic, while this is more rubbery. I mostly use it to peel and slice fruit for lunch at work, or when I'm out with the kids on the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want to cut items with ease? Buy this. I promise you will love it
customer_reviews.text: This knife us awesome... my husband calls it my Ginsu. I needed a good knife for cutting my steaks. I have a nice Calphalon knife set but the steak knives didn't cut through any of the steaks I got with ease. So I bought a cheap picnic set of paring knives but I didn't like the short handles. So I found this one and unfortunately I only bought one so it gets passed around my family during meals. So I'm in the process of finding more. 1 for each of us. Best paring knife I've ever come across. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kaltenbach

customer_reviews.title: Value, Cool factor, Great to use!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is razor sharp, the blade is flexible enough to let you feel what you're doing, and it looks super bad-ass. I gave it as a gift and it was a huge hit! Also, it's a crazy value, I have some Global knives, Friedrich Dick, and Henckles, and this knife is right up there.
customer_reviews.author: Jibbonte

customer_reviews.title: Very handy size
customer_reviews.text: This little knife is a workhorse for its size. I use them all over the place for different things from cutting up foods to cutting up cardboard boxes. They keep a good edge and sharpen easily when needing it. The sheath is handy and keep the knife safe, no nicking your hand digging in the drawer for a knife. I carry one in my purse too for odd times when you need to use a knife, much more sturdy and easy for hands to use than a small pocket knife.
customer_reviews.author: mewfuss

customer_reviews.title: Does the job comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: I lost a pairing knife I use at work for fruit and had another one, but it was so uncomfortable to use ergonomically. I thought I'd try this one as the handle looked a lot bigger. Somehow I ordered two and I am so glad I did! Now I have one for home and work. At home it is my go-to knife for cutting small fruit (e.g., apple). It fits nicely in my hand. I LOVE that it comes with a cover and it cuts pretty well. I have no complaints. A great knife for a great price. Now I just have to see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like a a real kitchen knife should!
customer_reviews.text: Not a cheaply made knife. I bought one for my mom too. Quality is extra rugged. Hard plastic with perfect shape grip. The edge of the knife cuts everything very well. I was tired of trying to cut a tomato and struggling. This knife works like a dream. I will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rabideau

customer_reviews.title: A Little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed for the money I spend it looks like it will not stay sharp and time will tell overall it was slicing vegetables better than my old paring knife. The size was adequate for chopping all produce.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife - it’s sharp, easy to clean, easy to hold, and I’m not worried that it’s going to slip in my hand and end up cutting me. (A great plus!) I love the sheath too - it fits snugly on the blade. I don’t have to worry that it’s going to slip off and cut something.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H Malbon

customer_reviews.title: Not the sharpest knife in the drawer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good sharp paring knife. This definitely was not it. First cut was on a tomato and couldn't even get through the skin. I have sharpened it and used a good steel to see if it will be somewhat useful. Not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: doug29

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product in that it is very sharp, has nice handle and does the job. The only negative is that only after a couple of months it is getting rust spots. I don't leave it in water or anything?? I just scrub them off with a scotchbrite pad.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great slicer
customer_reviews.text: I got a water bottle that has a compartment to infuse fruit so I needed a knife to cut the fruit. This is handy knife to have for a little bit of everything. I slice limes, strawberries, and more. It's good for slicing cake and orange chicken takeout. I'm very happy with it. The cover is great, I don't have to worry about storing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like this knife a lot. The size is just perfect, and it seems like the plastic is hard and won't break as some knives break right where the handle starts. I've opened cans with it as I didn't have a can opener, and it ruined the blade a bit, so I will be buying another one for sure, it's that great.
customer_reviews.author: PearCloud

customer_reviews.title: some knife
customer_reviews.text: This showed up as one of the best rated knives and I believe it. Super sharp and great sheath. I'll buy another if this one develops legs and leaves my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: max tanzen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, versatile paring knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite knife. My mom purchased them for my sister and I in college and thought the cover was great, but it turned out to be so much better than she thought! My roommate and I fight over this knife to take in our lunches to work for cutting fruit or avocados. I bought another knife so that we wouldn’t have to share! Love this knife!
customer_reviews.author: Paige M.

customer_reviews.title: Razor Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing is sharp! I know how to sharpen knifes, but I doubt if I can ever get it this sharp again. The handle feels good in the hand, and the rubber material really secures the knife in your grasp. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Xraycer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad so he can slice his fruit at work haha, it was a Christmas gift back in 2018 and he said it still cuts like its new. He uses it almost every shift
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Everything I want in a paring knife
customer_reviews.text: This has everything I want in a paring knife. It is sharp, strong, easy to hold, non-slip, short, and inexpensive. The rubberized handle is good for juicy fruits. Just remember to rinse it before it gets too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good covered knife for travel or lunch bag.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a covered knife to use in my lunch bag. I don’t always have time to cut up my fruit at home and this works great. Good design and fits my hand well. Sharp enough to get the job done. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mfiona

customer_reviews.title: Great knife -- but be careful!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is great, but it's very very sharp! I was using it the way I used my old paring knife and it slice into my thumb with almost no pressure. I'll probably using it just for slicing instead of as a paring knife in the future, and I'm glad it has a cover so that someone doesn't grab it out of the utensil drawer and get cut.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as just an extra pairing knife for the drawer. It is quite affordable and I was suprised at how nice and sharp it cuts. I actually use this now for most of my pairing.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: I like this knife.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a sharp pairing knife to cut limes for my raspberry mojitos and this fit the bill perfectly. It was inexpensive, it's really sharp and the hi-vis makes it easy to find. Mojito, anyone?
customer_reviews.author: TheLynx

customer_reviews.title: Zyliss knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sharp knife and comfortable to use. I appreciate the sheaf for safe storing. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Better Choices Available
customer_reviews.text: Knife is ok but you have to sharpen it to make it useful. Like the size and the feel, but feel there are better products out there for the same price. I buy these knives as throw away when they get dull. This one defeated that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Zyliss knives
customer_reviews.text: It's a Zyliss. What else is there to say. My favorite small knife. I have 5 sheaved Zyliss knives & very happy with all of them. I cook 2-3 meals every day for a gazillion years & use these every day.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Ugly green but great knife for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good knife for the money. You want something elegant, spend $70 on a German knife.
customer_reviews.author: larry b.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paring knives.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice paring knives, sharp and ready. The handle fits my hand better than the one on my OXO paring knife, and the grip works very well. They make cutting the ends off carrots a snap. And I really like the sheath cover, too. I'm glad I bought three of these, because I wouldn't want to have something to happen to the one I'm using and not have a spare on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Neff

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a knife just like that one. I was excited to find the very same one. It is very sharp but the left size to cut apples.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knife for winery and picnic outings!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small knife with a sheath for tossing in a bag with cheese and crackers and what not. This knife is nice and sharp, and has a solid well built feel. Great knife, especially at such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: What a great little knife!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little knife. It arrived scary sharp, I use it every day, and haven't had to sharpen it yet after the two months I've had it. The sheath is tight, and I enjoy the ability to reach for it without fear of slicing open my fingers. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my sister. She says it was the best knife she has ever owned!!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: It's great quality knife.
customer_reviews.text: Must have in kitchen easy inexpensive and durable sharp knife.
customer_reviews.author: tracker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Little Paring Knife
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Zyliss knives and this one is no exception. Cuts well, stays sharp and LOVE that it comes with a sheath so nobody gets cut when fishing through the drawer for it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W

customer_reviews.title: Best little knife ever
customer_reviews.text: Always my favorite, it's the best knife I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: D&T

customer_reviews.title: It's a great knife!
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife - easy to handle, sharp and love that has the sheath. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok.. I find I’ll still grab my older Pairing knife, old knife seems shaper
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. The case lets me bring this to work for lunch without punching a hole in my bag or backpack. The open design in the case is good because it lets the water out and dries good when washing. Knife is sharp with good steel. So sharp that the point got dented but I think it will be ok if I try sharpening it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife, very sharp and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: afd

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We lost our cutco paring knife so we bought this as a cheap replacement. While I don't like it as much as the cutco it is a good reasonably priced paring knife. It seems to hold an edge well. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: This knife is a perfect size for use in the kitchen. It stays sharp for a long time and is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little paring knife
customer_reviews.text: The Zyliss series of knives is wonderful. I have this paring knife and their chef knife, and they handle pretty much all my kitchen duties. The blade keeps an edge well and the rubberized grip is great for when my hands are wet. The cover is awesome too since I don't have a knife block to store my knives in. It also makes it handy for if I want to carry it along for my packed lunch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wang

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding choice for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my lunchbox to take to work. Sharp and secure. Grip is perfect. Looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Altus

customer_reviews.title: very nice knife
customer_reviews.text: I had the Victorinox paring knife before this, but the blade snapped. I like this one better. The blade is a little bigger and the handle makes it easier to grasp. I also like that it has a blade cover, since the knife lives in my cutlery drawer and gets banged around. It is, of course, very sharp, but then again, it's brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. They're low cost, hold an edge, and easy to sharpen. The handle makes them easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn

customer_reviews.title: Rusts easily
customer_reviews.text: I own 8 of these. Two had to be thrown away in the first two months due to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: good knife in safety sheild
customer_reviews.text: good knife in safety sheild. Cute color too. Put it in my travel bag so when we want to peel and apple, it's handy and we won't cut ourselves rumanging in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: vt

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a couple months. So far so good, use it almost every day
customer_reviews.author: Cote

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife fits great in my lunch box sharp and works well , very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great little knife!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and sturdy. Will be buying more in larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: lisa-ohio

customer_reviews.title: It ain’t easy being green
customer_reviews.text: I have accumulated a great set of knives from around the world cleavers from China French knives from Argentina only thing I was missing was a good set of pairing knives. This fulfills the role. I color coded knife color to blade.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great Paring Knife.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this knife. It is very sharp, love the blade cover and I love the green color and it fits nicely in my hand. I want to add more of these to my kitchen. I've had this paring knife and a serrated one in red for over a year. I use them all the time and they are both as sharp as when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, will order more
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife, very sharp and works great. I love the cover that comes with!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Carnes

customer_reviews.title: and its easy to sharpen back up
customer_reviews.text: very sharp, keeps it relatively long, and its easy to sharpen back up. it feels strong, I've been using mine for >6mo. every single day and not a single drop of rust on it.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, particularly for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed mostly with how sharp it stays for how long, especially for the money! Really good knife and value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: go to small knife
customer_reviews.text: what a nice paring knife- sharp and easy to hold, it has become my small knife of choice. the sheath is not used as i prefer magnetic strips to hold all my knives(safer and less damage than a drawer- not to mention easier to find instantly).the knife came sharp but being picky i sharpened and now it is SHARP! holds a nice edge and a snap to clean-like i said, anice paring knife.
customer_reviews.author: peterforpats

customer_reviews.title: I now own 3 of these bad boys!
customer_reviews.text: This little knife is BIGGER that the average paring knife but works 10 times better. Was able to fully peal tomatoes for salsa with it! That's sharp. Quality is superior to knifes I have used that cost 5 times as much! Highly recommended. Wait, I need to buy another one for work now! ;)
customer_reviews.author: TURBODRIVER24

customer_reviews.title: The knife itself has been great, but seriously so sharp
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as can be, but the plastic cover broke shortly after we used it thereby negating the cover since it has a chunk missing that exposes the blade. It defeats the purpose of buying a sheathed knife. The knife itself has been great, but seriously so sharp, I'm afraid to leave it in a drawer by itself.
customer_reviews.author: KnM R.

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this, fun color, great price exactly what I expect from this brand. Just be careful, they are very sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Haak

customer_reviews.title: Great knive
customer_reviews.text: Love this little knive! Good steel very sharp. A little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Crazy sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, awesome price,I will be buying one every year for cutting deer meat.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: No slipping
customer_reviews.text: Great paring knife. Super grippy handle allows for precise cuts with no slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality
customer_reviews.text: So sharp! I don't really like the green color, but this little knife is very handy. Perfect for preparing snacks in a dorm. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat the Quality for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Truly can't beat the price! Works extremely well and I'm more than happy I purchased this product. I don't need 10 different knives -- just 2 -- and I bought this one and the larger purple one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Elizabeth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pairing knife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pairing knife. Makes cooking preparation a breeze. Thanks so much for a wonderful product!! Fast and smooth transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa samra

customer_reviews.title: My Kitchen Sidekick
customer_reviews.text: This little knife is great! I use it in the kitchen everyday and I love that I can take it on camping trips (since it has a blade cover). It holds its edge really well. If I ever misplaced it, I would definitely order a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: c.love

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sharp, feels good in your hand. I like the size, its easily controllable but big enough to cut fibrous vegetables. I thought the price was good, and I try and buy knives with covers....saves fingers and keeps the blade sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Turnbough

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen knife.
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Zyliss knife purchase. Nice and sharp nice kitchen knife.
customer_reviews.author: Barb C. Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of them have been worn down with love. We saw this Zyliss knife that looked different ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a half dozen paring knives. Most of them have been worn down with love. We saw this Zyliss knife that looked different than any of our other knives, and knew we had to have it. Not only is it beautiful in the hand,but it works...
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small lunchbox. Solved the problem of my regular knives trying to cut into the lining of the lunchbox!
customer_reviews.author: bkp

customer_reviews.title: Really Grat Peeler and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paring knife so I could peel apples for my pies and apple sauce I just love it but it is so sharp you must be very careful you do not cut your finger (been thee done that) so now I know how to use it I enjoy peeling my apples . Its just nice to have a sharp knife.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine state

customer_reviews.title: which I love. This is a great little paring knife
customer_reviews.text: I also bought the 5.5-in version (purple handle), which I love. This is a great little paring knife. I especially like the blade cover, which helps me keep the blade sharp when I'm storing the knife in the utensil drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife
customer_reviews.text: I have had this knife for a few weeks now and love it. It's comfortable and sharp. I cut tons of fruit working as a bartender and was tired of using the dull knives provided by my work. The included blade cover makes sure it doesn't dull as I transport it almost daily to and from work. Very happy with this knife for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Alexander

customer_reviews.title: These knives are amazing! Extremely sharp - so be careful
customer_reviews.text: These knives are amazing! Extremely sharp - so be careful! But the grip is solid and with the sheath, I can storm them in a drawer easily. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife, was very excited to put it to use. It has held its edge very well during the time I have been using the knife.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Vierra

customer_reviews.title: They don’t slide
customer_reviews.text: I like how I don’t lose my grip and it stays sharp.m
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K. Evanchalk

customer_reviews.title: SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: So sharp. Be careful! My only thought... I wish the knife cover wasn't open on the sides. I've cut myself a few times just trying to get the cover on. Perfect paring knife!
customer_reviews.author: MOlson725

customer_reviews.title: so I know it to be good quality. Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have another Zyliss knife, so I know it to be good quality. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: F Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER GREAT ZYLISS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have gone threw so many paring knives in my adult life. (I'm 67) I had bought a Zyliss can opener recently and I loved the product. I decided to try this paring knife. It is great. The slide cover also keeps it safe and clean.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little knife. Very sharp. Color great for finding it.
customer_reviews.author: LTK

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives. They are always dirty because we always choose them first! Very sharp (which is great). It's nice that they come with the protective sheath so we can put them in our lunch boxes. Kitchen must have.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Excellent paring knife. No need to sharpen it yet so I can’t comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest. I bought this knife so my wife wouldn't use my knives to cut stuff on a ceramic plate. I cringe every time she cuts a steak on a plate with one of my pairing or chefs knifes. To her a knife is a knife. Its doesn't matter what knife. Upon receiving it, i was very happy with it. It feels nice and has a pretty good edge. Actually, it has a great edge for a $10-$15 knife.
customer_reviews.author: henry miller

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a friend’s and had to track it down. Terrific all-round knife.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, ergonomic, knife is very sharp, good for cutting veggies in a small space, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is nice and sharp, I hope it retains a good edge after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and grippy handle
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and grippy handle, but doesn't stay very sharp. Even using a ceramic rod for light maintenance, will lose it edge very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical as to how good this knife was going to be for the price. But I was presently surprised about how good it is. The blade holds an edge very well, the handle is very comfortable. I liked the paring knife so much I just bought their Chef's Knife also.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schillinger

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Knife
customer_reviews.text: This pairs great with the! Most chefs agree that a great knife is an absolute necessity of any cook. This one is great for smaller applications that require a smaller knife, like peeling small fruits, slicing smaller things, or for removing fat from meat. The safety cover is great since there isn't a knife block to put it in, and that way you can feel safer about leaving it in a drawer. Beware though - it is incredibly sharp! Zyliss makes great products that won't leave you with an empty wallet. I would recommend this product. Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: A Branch

customer_reviews.title: They stay sharp.
customer_reviews.text: They are very sharp and easy to hold. I bought one around four years ago and ordered another one because I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: brenda jolissaint

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp, love the cover!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sharp, but don't wash it in the dishwasher or it will dull quickly (as will any knife). Sharpens up easily though.
customer_reviews.author: JBurke

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Pairing Knife
customer_reviews.text: The Wife really liked it, it's sharp and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: scott rasely

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t cut anything
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package this knife wouldn’t cut an onion. How can you sell a knife that doesn’t cut?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My personal paring knife
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent knife. Very sharp. Does what it should
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Zyliss - great knives
customer_reviews.text: Great knives. Wish they came as a boxed set, and that the red wave edged were larger. Awesome - bought all four available on Amazon, green, red, purple and the yellow butter knife
customer_reviews.author: Roger Young

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife...
customer_reviews.text: Great knife! Sturdy and sharp. The sheath is solid and fits snugly. Feels good in my hand. A good traveling utility knife.
customer_reviews.author: DMoe

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! I use it everyday. It's sharp and smooth. The color options were nice. My husband says the green I picked is ridiculous lol But I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great color and sharpness. The cover is nice to have if you ever need to bring it on a picnic or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Indialpc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was really sharp. I like the partially rubberized handle. The blade cover is nice when you need to pack it along.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: great buy for sharp little knife
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the Zyliss products & this knife is so inexpensive for what it is. Nicely shaped sharp blade & comfortable handle. Also bought the red serrated version. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: s.a.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, easy to use, handles feel good in my hands, cuts well, cheap.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Zyliss Paring Knife
customer_reviews.text: So sharp!!! Works great Slices potatoes for fried or scalloped potatoes real easy I would recommend it to anyone. Good.

product_meta.title: ZYLISS Paring Knife with Sheath Cover, 3.5-Inch Stainless Steel Blade, Green
feature_bullets: Paring knife perfectly controls cutting, slicing and peeling of fruits and vegetables
High-carbon stainless steel blade retains super sharp edge and easily re-sharpens for long lasting use
Ergonomic handle with soft touch rubber grip, reduces hand fatigue and allows for precision and control
Safety blade guard protects knife for travel and storage
5 Year Zyliss Guarantee, Dishwasher Safe - Handwash Recommended
